channel.title: Juniors Air Crafter v1.8 - Updated: 3/10/07
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]SCRIPT PRIVATED[/b][/size] Yo everyone its Junior.
If it does NOT find essence in bank, it will take a screen shot of it. Send that screen shot to me so I can update ess finding.
Before starting, [u]read the directions[/u], [u]and auto safely![/u] ~Jr
[u][b]DIRECTIONS::[/b][/u] [b]1-[/b] Have color on V-bright, AND low detail. [b]2-[/b] Stand in Fally east bank, in front of any bankbooth. [b]3-[/b] Make sure to have tiara or tally on your characters. [b]4-[/b] Have fun.
[b]This script does not include a bank pinner![/b]
[b][u]Total Views: 104, plus dl's at bottom[/u][/b]
I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BANNED ACOUNT, AUTO CORRECTLY
[b]If you want to see the stats for this script, check it out here(link below).[/b] [ul][li]http://www.stats.srl-forums.com/index.php?action=view_script&id=83[/li][/ul]

item.title: Juniors Air Crafter v1.8 - Updated: 3/10/07
item.dc:creator: @petrock6 petrock6
item.description:
@petrock6 wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:1, topic:35573”]Yo everyone its Junior.

[size=30pt]PLEASE READ! [/size]

ITS BACK!!!
The uptext finding problem should be solved thanks to tarajunky for the help.
If the uptext still didnt work, it will take a picture of it. Send this picture to me
so I can update the text finding even more to make it better.

Before starting, read the directions, and auto safely!

~Jr

DIRECTIONS::
1- Have color on V-bright, AND low detail.
2- Stand in Fally east bank.
3- Have all accounts that you are using, standing in the
bankbooth farthest to the right if your compass is
south OR farthest to the left if your compass is north.
4- Make sure to have tiara or tally on your characters.
5- Auto coloring will only work if symbols are not covered by
NPC’s or any other thing that shows up on MM.
6- Have fun.

                                             [b]This script does not include a bank pinner![/b]

TIPS::
– Start script logged out for better results.
– Manual pick bank color.

Progress Report
Now this is what im talking about!! It stopped because it was hovering over the rune essence at bank,
but this was BEFORE I fixed the problem in the newest version.

Version History
- Version V.38 - first release. [Release date: 12/15/06] Views: 13
- Version V.51 - Fixed some problems with using talisman, updated walking a little
[Date of release: 12/19/06] Views: 8
- Version V.59 - Just added and changed some procedures here and there, and
fixed the ess hovering, finally.
[Date of release: 12/25/06] Views: 9
- Version V.68 - Can now be used with SRL 3.6, made ess finding better.
[Date of release: 12/28/06] Views: 39
- Version V.78 - Fixed (i think) ess finding in bank completely.
[Date of release: 1/24/07]

                                               [b][u]Total Views: 69, plus dl's at bottom[/u][/b]

                       I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BANNED ACOUNT, AUTO CORRECTLY[/quote]

Thanks a bunch dude!

item.title: Juniors Air Crafter v1.8 - Updated: 3/10/07
item.dc:creator: @Enz0 Enz0
item.description:
@Enz0 wrote:

well, I am about to try this out on my noob to see if it works, sounds like it does.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:05:37 PM[/size][hr][quote=“junior, post:24, topic:35573”]just to let you know its the best script i made. im currently making a fire lighter also (you gave me the idea for that), but there are some minor problems with it that i need help on at the moment. extracting SRL is easy, just read how to do it at www.villu-reborn.com
and you will need SRL to use the firelighting im making, sorry.[/quote]:] I just got SRL so I will beable to use it…I also Got one but your will probley be better, Also your script works fine for the first load and it gets stuck on the secound. ONe of my glitches where it didn’t craft the runes the second time. The other one was it would get into the bank open the bank put the cursor on the essence and move around a bunch of times then it says it couldn’t find the essence…I am like its on it. But I just keep restarting it and it works fine that way.

Read full topic

@junior wrote:

Yea theres always been a peoblem with finding the rune essence… The function I made works for my perfectly, I dont know what else I can do about it though.
It cant find the rune essence because there are 2 fonts, a thick dark orange font and a lighter thinner orange font. Ill try changing the bitmap to a black background and white letter, I think that will work better.

EDIT: Just updated, the essence finding should be better now.
